artist: Artist: Fly Orr, called Fly; Author: Merry Drithers
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, text and reproduction of a painting of a figure standing in a dark rain shower of water, small green fish, and eyes; 16 pp.
inscription: Inside front cover, black ink pen: 37/30 [small drawing of a fly] 7/28/2k1 / fly@bway.net
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
signed: Inside front cover, purple ink pen: M. Dithers [drawing of a little face with glasses]
title: Ali & the King's Tears
